welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fountain Hills, one of the most charming and picturesque destinations in the United States. Known for its stunning fountain, beautiful mountains, and warm community, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Scottsdale Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Scottsdale Municipal Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves primarily international and some domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serves a majority of domestic and some international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Phoenix Deer Valley Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Phoenix Deer Valley Airport, primarily used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Williams Gateway Airport serves all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Williams Gateway Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and convenient experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
